title: zero_lt_4dfp
description: A tool to process 4dfp image files by zeroing values less than a given float threshold.

flt_value.title: Float threshold
flt_value.description: Floating point threshold value. Values less than this in the 4dfp file will be zeroed.

outroot.title: Output root
outroot.description: Output root name for 4dfp file. If not specified, defaults to input file root with 'z' appended.

endianness.title: Endianness
endianness.description: Specify output endian format: 'b' for big endian or 'l' for little endian. Defaults to input endian.
